pullRequest.title: fix(client): adding support to provide a plain okhttp client with sys…
pullRequest.bodyText: This change allows us to migrate from okhttp2 and use clientProvider implementation for all non-spinnaker endpoints like slack, pagerduty etc.

beforeCommit.message: fix(client): adding support to provide a plain okhttp client with system defaulted ssl socket factory

afterCommit.message: fix(client): adding support to provide a plain okhttp client with system defaulted ssl socket factory

nodes.bodyText: Hm, I feel like I'm missing something here.  So is it assumed that a PlainServiceEndpoint will have a keystore and a truststore?

Not sure about Plain but otherwise this seems reasonable to me.
Maybe Simple or Basic?
